name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Fantasy Landscapes
description:
Enjoy 30 puzzles of increasing difficulty featuring original artwork of stunning fantasy landscapes!

- 30 Original puzzles to complete!
- Difficult ranges from 60 pieces to 500 pieces
- Gallery mode to view the artworks after completion
- Steam achievements
- Hours of casual and relaxing gameplay
- Ghost-Image mode for easier completion
- Border-Only mode for easier completion
- Shuffle and bring pieces closer for a more enjoyable experience!
